name: LioDen Dragon Layout
description:
One of the layouts from my Free CSS Layouts thread on LioDen(http://www.lioden.com/topic.php?id=25549), now for the whole site ;)


Original art by http://theoutcast1821.deviantart.com/  Wallpaper was made by them and available for download.
(Their signature can't be seen well at some screen sizes. I take absolutely no credit for it. The only thing here that is mine is the coding.)
